name: Gold Pride - Better Luck Next Time!
text: When this card is activated: You can add 1 "Gold Pride" monster from your Deck to your hand, and if you do, lose LP equal to its ATK. If a face-up "Gold Pride" monster(s) you control that was Special Summoned from the Extra Deck returns to the Extra Deck (except during the Damage Step): You can draw 1 card. You can only use this effect of "Gold Pride - Better Luck Next Time!" once per turn. You can only activate 1 "Gold Pride - Better Luck Next Time!" per turn.
